column5: Thanks for the input guys on a fly in outfitter for 2 couples,I booked snelgrove lake with clarks fly in they have a week day special going on 15% off
Looking for a report on the fishing at snelgrove. Also interested in any sasquatch info you gather!
Hey Tree Monkey - How was the trip to Snelgrove? Any reports? Dad and I booked a week in early July 2019. We also took advantage of the weekday fly-in, and got 15% off the rate.
